```{r load_packages}
library(dplyr)
library(htmltools)
library(reactable)
library(readxl)
library(stringr)
```

```{r import_data}
df <-
  read_excel("cv/data/infos.xlsx", sheet = "Communications") |> 
  arrange(-ID) |> 
  mutate(
    Type = ifelse(Type == "oral", "Oral", "Poster"),
    City = paste0(City, " (", Country, ")")
    ) |>
  select(
    ID, 
    Year, 
    Title, 
    Authors, 
    Congress, 
    City, 
    Type
    ) 
```

```{r show_data}
reactable(
  df,
  searchable = TRUE,
  minRows = 1, 
  showPageSizeOptions = TRUE,
  defaultPageSize = 100,
  paginationType = "jump",
  strip = TRUE,
  columns = list(
    ID = colDef(minWidth = 50),
    Year = colDef(minWidth = 80),
    Title = colDef(minWidth = 300),
    Authors = colDef(minWidth = 300),
    Congress = colDef(minWidth = 120),
    City = colDef(minWidth = 120)
  )
)
```
